results.description: Russia became the third team to qualify for Euro 2020 after thrashing 10-man Cyprus 5-0.
results.shortTitle: Russia thrash Cyprus to reach Euro 2020
results.title: Cyprus 0-5 Russia: Russia qualify for Euro 2020 with Cyprus thrashing

results.description: Scotland conceded four goals in 27 second-half minutes in Moscow as their slender hopes of automatic Euro 2020 qualification were finally extinguished by a dominant Russia.
results.shortTitle: Scotland need play-off after Russia rout
results.title: Russia 4-0 Scotland: Scots out of automatic Euro 2020 contention after rout

results.description: What lessons have Scotland learned from their 2-1 defeat to Russia at Hampden Park ahead of the return game in Moscow?
results.title: Russia v Scotland: Lessons learned from Hampden defeat

thumbnail.altText: Charlie Mulgrew against Russia at Hampden

results.description: The results are in from the Scotland team selector to play Russia and the Tartan Army wants debuts for Declan Gallagher and Lawrence Shankland.
results.title: Russia v Scotland: Fans want Lawrence Shankland to lead the line

results.description: El informante habría trabajado durante más de una década para el servicio de inteligencia estadounidense en el Kremlin accediendo, incluso, al escritorio de Putin, según medios de EE.UU. Un portavoz del gobierno ruso, sin embargo, negó esta información y dijo que Smolenkov no tenía contacto con el presidente.
results.title: Qué se sabe de Oleg Smolenkov, el supuesto espía de EE.UU. con acceso a Putin que la CIA sacó de Rusia en 2017

results.description: Aleksandr Kokorin and Pavel Mamaev are set to be released from prison after they were jailed for hooliganism in May.
results.shortTitle: Russian players to be freed from jail
results.title: Russia internationals Aleksandr Kokorin and Pavel Mamaev to be released from prison

results.description: Oli McBurnie addressed the rest of the Scotland squad after controversy over a social media video, says assistant coach Steven Reid.
results.shortTitle: Line drawn under McBurnie issue - Reid
results.title: Oli McBurnie: Line drawn under social media video issue, says Steven Reid

results.description: Watch highlights on Sportscene and follow all the reaction as Steve Clarke's Scotland lose 2-1 to Russia to leave automatic Euro 2020 qualification a forlorn hope.
results.title: 'It was as if the goal scared us' - Reaction after Scotland lose to Russia

results.description: Jailed Russia international Aleksandr Kokorin is set to get his first league winners' medal after Zenit St Petersburg win the domestic title.
results.shortTitle: Jailed Kokorin set to get league medal
results.title: Aleksandr Kokorin: Jailed Russia international to receive league winners' medal

results.description: Two Russia internationals have been jailed after being found guilty of hooliganism following two incidents in Moscow in October.
results.title: Russia internationals Aleksandr Kokorin and Pavel Mamaev jailed for hooliganism

results.description: La Commission européenne a condamné le fabricant d'équipements sportifs Nike à payer une amende de 12,5 millions d'euros pour avoir restreint la vente de marchandises des meilleurs clubs de football européens.
results.title: Nike épinglée par l'UE sur les marchandises sportives

results.description: Chelsea's Eden Hazard scores twice to spare the blushes of former club-mate Thibaut Courtois as Belgium defeat Euro 2020 qualification rivals Russia.
results.shortTitle: Hazard scores twice in Belgium win
results.title: Belgium 3-1 Russia: Eden Hazard scores twice in Euro 2020 qualifier

results.description: An aid to Russian president Vladimir Putin condemns Pavel Pogrebnyak after he said it was "laughable" to have a black player in the Russian national team.
results.title: Russian striker Pavel Pogrebnyak's comment on black players 'smells of racism'

results.description: Manchester City forward Leroy Sane scores his first international goal as Germany beat Russia 3-0 in an international friendly.
results.shortTitle: Man City's Sane gets first Germany goal
results.title: Germany 3-0 Russia: Manchester City's Leroy Sane scores first international goal

results.description: Le Mondial-2018 de football a injecté 12,5 milliards d'euros dans l'économie russe, soit plus de 1% de son produit intérieur brut (PIB).
results.title: Mondial 2018 : les bons comptes de la Russie

results.description: Two Russia internationals under investigation over an attack in Moscow should face severe punishment, says the Russian Premier League.
results.title: Russia internationals Aleksandr Kokorin & Pavel Mamaev should face 'severe punishment'

results.description: Artem Dzyuba continues his fine international form as he scores the winner for Russia in their Nations League opener against Turkey.
results.shortTitle: Dzyuba earns Russia win over Turkey
results.title: Turkey 1-2 Russia: Artem Dzyuba scores winner in Nations League

results.description: Chelsea midfielder Jorginho equalises for Italy as they draw 1-1 with Poland in the Uefa Nations League.
results.shortTitle: Italy held by Poland in Nations League
results.title: Uefa Nations League live: Italy v Poland

results.description: Stanislav Cherchesov signs a two-year contract extension as head coach of the Russia national team.
results.title: Stanislav Cherchesov: Russia coach signs contract extension

results.description: Monaco sign Russia's World Cup midfielder Aleksandr Golovin from CSKA Moscow on a five-year contract.
